name: DOG PARTY!!!
description:
My entry for the notGDCJam 2019! I entered this jam on a whim and "dog party" immediately popped into my head for whatever reason. And here we are! Anything that gives me an excuse to write some pumpin' beats.

Controls: Move with the arrow keys and bash into other dogs and objects to interact with them

Download the music here: https://jthomeslice.bandcamp.com/track/dog-party-rock-anthem

Made with the wonderful Bitsy tool by Adam Le Doux and add bitsy audio by mark wonnacott
